record.dc:title: 87UN4 McCarty Farm Site 6UN4, Union County, Tennessee. Mound 3. Feature 1. Fire place composed of small circular pit and burnt charcoals and fire cracked stones.
record.wpa:comments: Observer illustration on file at the institution. See also photographs 58UN4 [fhm1758], 60UN4 [fhm01760], 61UN4 [fhm01761], and 86UN4 [fhm01765].
